item.title: Help me with my shop Pleasee

item.description:
@haha_w_e wrote:

Ok I spawned Santa:
spawn = 1552 3251 3439 0 0 0 0 0 1 Santa Store

Then I Made my Store:
shop = 7 @whi@Santa’s_Sack 2 2 - Had alot more stuff i sell and the item id

Then I put the thing in on NPCHandler:
}
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) { // Santa - Santa’s Sack
if (misc.random1(30) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Get your Holiday Items Here!”;

Then I put the other thing in Client:
} else if (NPCID == 570) { //Santa’s_Sack
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 7;

And I still can’t get into the store when I click “Talk to Santa” button when you right click on him.

What am I doing wrong?!?
